ustashe -Jasenovac; and if it looks like holocaust, feel like holocaust, and smell like holocaust then it is - Bleiburg massacre= holocaust

Restoring original language about Jews of Europe. Though Jews were confined in North Africa, few were killed, and mass killings did not take place. The previous language was very roundabout.

Reverted edits by [[Special:Contributions/24.125.112.170|24.125.112.170]] to last version by Borisblue
"Jews of Europe" would generalize all countries, even those opposed to Nazi Germany, it would alienate North Africa.
Jews were targeted in countries the Germans did not occupy (Italy, Romania), areas that were not countries (Western Russia) and a little in North Africa. Jews of Europe is best of the many versions.
